answerText: Italy[10] This 19th century Italian poet wrote about the beauty of a "shipwreck of the sea" in his poem "The Infinite." He is known for his canti, which convey a sense of pessimism about the state of the world.
heading: Dragoon |2013 | 2 | 8 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: G. A. Borgese coined the term "Twilight Poets" to refer to a group of poets from this country that used musical language to convey a sense of despondency. [10] Name this country home to Guido Gozzano, as well as Petrarch.
